#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Live Two Different Lives
#Text=If you are like many people , you are a person that has many different identities , good and bad .
#Text=Many people do not fulfill their several identities but instead settle for only living out one identity .
#Text=Others , because they are braver , or simply more adventurous , embrace their several identities and live them out to their fullest .
#Text=However , usually , out of necessity , you must separate your chosen identities and thus live multiple lives .
#Text=This article should help guide you along the way to living two ( or more ! ) different lives in a legal manner .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Realize and accept you are a multifaceted and complex person .
#Text=For some , this can be hard to realize because they have , for their entire life , felt constricted and trapped by the roles they have been forced to play in their life .
#Text=The concept that you are a different person than those around you realize can be quite a liberating experience .
#Text=Discover who you really are .
#Text=You are allowed to be whoever you truly are .
#Text=( Within reason of course !
#Text=If you are not a brain surgeon than please do n't scrub in for surgery and start operating !
#Text=Please do n't hurt others . )
#Text=Figure out ways to live and be yourself .
#Text=Take classes , read books , and research the identity you believe you are .
#Text=Simply just be yourself .
#Text=If you secretly really want to be a drag queen , then rent a hotel room , dress up , find a friendly club and go crazy out there !
#Text=If you are younger ( under 18 ) than this is obviously where you will have the most trouble .
#Text=Your parents and family may have issues with you just being yourself especially if they are strict .
#Text=This is where it really helps to have at least one person who knows who your other identity is , and who you can be your true self around even just to vent .
#Text=Figure out if you need money .
#Text=Some double lives require a lot of cash on hand .
#Text=Such is the case if you have to travel frequently to fulfill your life .
#Text=Think through this and make sure you are set financially .
#Text=Get another job if you have to ( this in itself can be a secret life depending on the work you do ) .
#Text=Find ways to be yourself and have fun !
#Text=Warnings
#Text=If you know your job will have a problem with who you are , then you are basically in the same situation as when your parents did not approve .
#Text=Thankfully , however , it is easier to hide what you are doing from your employer then it is to hide it from your parents .
#Text=If you believe you may lose your employment if your boss finds out what you are doing then be very careful !
